title: Bug 121687: Exception throws when exporting data in a table which is inside a grid cell
description: When trying to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
OB: When attempting to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception occurs in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() function.
EB: When exporting data in two tables, the expected result is that the data should be successfully exported without any exceptions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Navigate to the grid containing the table.
2. Attempt to export the data in the table.
3. Observe the exception being thrown in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() function.
